overview_of_class:
Foundations of Music Technology

This course will introduce music students to key concepts in acoustics, digital audio theory, production, and post production. Students will learn skills that will allow them to record and edit their own work, use notation software, communicate effectively with recording engineers, and prepare their work for online presentation.
name: Foundations of Music Tech for Music Majors
title: MUSIC MUS_TECH 300-0-20 Foundations of Music Tech for Music Majors
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Restricted to Music Undergraduates
Add Consent: Instructor Consent Required
